item.title: Google Trends for Campaigns
item.description: Over the past few years we have seen Google Trends becoming quite ubiquitous in politics.

item.title: Introducing trendyy
item.description: trendyy is a package for querying Google Trends. It is build around Philippe Massicotteâ€™s package gtrendsR which accesses this data wonderfully.
